reviewText:
Aside from the fact that the sides of the video have been trimmed from the screen (to possibly avoid copyright issues, if the TV station emblem were shown?), the DVD set is of decent quality. While the subs are not always grammatically perfect, they make sense to a native English speaker and keep pace with the storyline.

Overall, I am happy with this purchase and would recommend it to anyone who wants to see the gem of a drama that is Evasive Inquiry Agency.

I had watch this show when I was young and now, I'm still love this show. Treasure-hunting adventure upon this town, filled with heartwarming romances, sidesplitting humors, drama, friendship, mystery and thrills!!! Korean version of grown-up Goonies and Indiana Jones.
I ought to overlook somewhat inaccurate captions.
